item.title: Lightweight Linux Distributions For Older PCs
item.description: https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/lightweight-linux-distributions-for-your-pc/ Name Site Comment Puppy Linux https://puppylinux-woof-ce.github.io/ This tiny OS weighs in at under 300MB, so it can run smoothly even on systems with as little as 512MB of RAM. Bodhi Linux https://www.bodhilinux.com/ System requirements are just 512MB of RAM and a 500MHz processor. Peppermint OS https://peppermintos.com/ It only needs 512MB of RAM to run, so it will fly on that Pentium 4 machine or Core 2 Duo laptop you have stashed in your closet.
